Description.Text:
Position The Palace hotel is located near the centre of Bormio. The ski slopes are in easy reach with the hotel’s private shuttle bus.
Restaurant Guests can choose between international cuisine and typical local specialities, the dining room and the Stube will create the right atmosphere to enjoy a delicious meal accompanied by a good wine from the hotel’s wine cellar. New years dinner 31.12.07 included
Outside
Lobby
More Informations The Hotel Bar provides a cosy meeting place particularly in the evening, with its welcoming open fire. The Health & Beauty Centre is ideal after a day on the slopes. An entrance card is needed which costs €50 per week for the use of "Vitarium", steam bath, re-vitalizing showers, sauna, Jacuzzi and solarium. In the centre you can also book massages, body and face treatments with an extra charge. There is also an internal heated pool (m. 20 x m. 10) and fitness room which are free of charge.
Check-in: from 4:00 p.m. Check-out: by 10:30 a.m.
